diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Metabolomics.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    Metabolomics[Metabolomics] --> Detection[Metabolite Detection]
    Metabolomics --> Analysis[Metabolic Analysis]
    Metabolomics --> Applications[Applications]
    Detection --> MS[Mass Spectrometry]
    Detection --> NMR[NMR Spectroscopy]
    Analysis --> Identification[Metabolite Identification]
    Analysis --> Quantification[Quantification]
    Applications --> Biomarkers[Biomarker Discovery]
    Applications --> Pathways[Metabolic Pathways]
